languages.text: "Т-только холод чувствую. Все бы отдал... за каплю тепла".
"N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."
languages.original_text: "Т-только холод чувствую. Все бы отдал... за каплю тепла".

traits.locale_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."

languages.text: "N-Nein, aber es ist so kalt. Ich gäbe alles ... für etwas Wärme."
languages.original_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."

traits.locale_text: "N-Nein, aber es ist so kalt. Ich gäbe alles ... für etwas Wärme."

languages.text: « Non, elles sont juste engourdies par le froid. Je... je donnerais tout pour sentir à nouveau la chaleur. »
languages.original_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."

traits.locale_text: « Non, elles sont juste engourdies par le froid. Je... je donnerais tout pour sentir à nouveau la chaleur. »

languages.text: «No... no, solo siento frío. Daría lo que fuera... por entrar en calor».
languages.original_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."

traits.locale_text: «No... no, solo siento frío. Daría lo que fuera... por entrar en calor».

languages.text: 「い、いや、ただ冷たいだけ。もう一度暖かさを感じられるなら...何だってする」
languages.original_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."

traits.locale_text: 「い、いや、ただ冷たいだけ。もう一度暖かさを感じられるなら...何だってする」

languages.text: “不……我只觉得冷。只要能让我再次感到温暖……无论要付出什么代价，我都愿意。”
languages.original_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."

traits.locale_text: “不……我只觉得冷。只要能让我再次感到温暖……无论要付出什么代价，我都愿意。”

languages.text: "H... Hayır, çok soğuk. Sıcağı bir kez daha hissedebilmek için... Her şeyi yaparım."
languages.original_text: "N-no, it's just so cold. I'd give anything... to feel warm again."
